title: Dancehall
description: When the well-preserved body of a young woman surfaces from the icy depths of Lake Placid twenty years after her death, the professional and personal life of successful businessman David Powell begins to crumble. Authorities don't know her identity, only that her death had been violent. For Powell, the discovery fuels deep-seated fears and threatens to uncover secrets he has hidden from his beautiful wife and daughter. Struggling to hold on to his family and business, Powell faces a cunning opponent who threatens everything he's worked for, even his very life. A perennial best-seller,  Dancehall  engages the reader in a tale of intrigue, passion and suspense that captivates to the final page.
author: Bernard F. Conners
